verses.name: Philemon 1:1
verses.text: Paul, a prisoner of Jesus Christ, and Timothy our brother, unto Philemon our dearly beloved, and fellowlabourer,

verses.name: Philemon 1:2
verses.text: And to our beloved Apphia, and Archippus our fellowsoldier, and to the church in thy house:

verses.name: Philemon 1:3
verses.text: Grace to you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Philemon 1:4
verses.text: I thank my God, making mention of thee always in my prayers,

verses.name: Philemon 1:5
verses.text: Hearing of thy love and faith, which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus, and toward all saints;

verses.name: Philemon 1:6
verses.text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus.
